title: BagOfSnit Frontend Development
description:
Complete the BagOfSnit frontend application for principal linking. The frontend at bagofsnit/src/bagofsnit_frontend/ needs:
- UI for requesting principal links
- UI for confirming link requests (as primary)
- Display of linked principals
- Integration with Internet Identity or other auth
- Balance display showing aggregated balance across linked principals
- Testing and deployment

title: Update SNIT logo and metadata
description:
Replace placeholder logo with actual SNIT branding:
- Current logo is a blue placeholder SVG
- Design proper SNIT token logo
- Update icrc1 metadata with final branding
- Consider adding additional metadata fields

title: Add content_id to purchase tracking
description:
The readme.md documents snit_purchase as taking content_id but PurchaseArgs only has dave and amount. Options:
1. Add content_id field to PurchaseArgs and track what content users purchased
2. Update documentation to match current implementation
This would enable Daves to know which specific content items users purchased, useful for analytics and content unlocking.

title: Security Review of Non-Transferability
description:
Audit the non-transferability implementation to ensure:
- can_transfer hook correctly blocks all user-to-user transfers
- can_approve and can_transfer_from hooks are working
- can_transfer_batch blocks batch transfers
- Principal linking balance merge is secure (burn/mint atomic concerns)
- No edge cases allow unauthorized token movement
- Review ICRC-2 approval blocking is complete

title: Dave SDK/Documentation
description:
Create documentation and SDK for partner apps (Daves) to integrate with SNIT:
- API documentation for Dave registration and approval flow
- Code examples for snit_mint integration
- Code examples for snit_purchase handling
- Best practices for Snitdust consumption
- Example Dave application implementation

title: Production Deployment to IC Mainnet
description:
Deploy SNIT token canister to the Internet Computer mainnet. This involves:
- Final review of production configuration in prod_deploy.sh
- Ensure archive canister has sufficient cycles (20T minimum)
- Configure production principals and ownership
- Deploy and verify all ICRC standard endpoints work correctly
- Document the production canister ID

title: Add mint cooldown/rate limiting
description:
Consider adding rate limiting for Dave minting to prevent abuse:
- Per-user cooldown after receiving mint
- Per-Dave daily/hourly mint limits
- Global rate limiting
This would prevent Daves from spamming mints to artificially inflate user balances.

title: Automated Integration Test Suite
description:
Create automated tests beyond the manual TEST_COMMANDS.md. Should include:
- Unit tests for level/XP calculations
- Integration tests for Dave registration flow
- Integration tests for principal linking (BagOfSnit)
- Integration tests for mint/purchase/dust flow
- CI/CD pipeline integration
Consider using Motoko test framework or PocketIC.
